maml:description.maml:para: Generate random password of specified length including upper and lower case characters, numbers and special characters.

Generates a random password. you're able to specify: - The desired password length (minimum = 10) - Whether or not to use lowercase characters - Whether or not to use uppercase characters - Whether or not to use numbers - Whether or not to use special characters - Whether or not to avoid using similar characters ( e.g. o, 0, 1, I)
